title: My microphone doesn't work when on speakerphone (Pixel 4a 5G)
content: I have tested my phone on normal calls and when on speaker. I have tried multiple apps, and have tried with my phone case on and off. However the problem persists: if I call via speaker, I can hear the other person but they cannot hear me. I have muted and unmuted myself, but that doesn't work, so I think it is a manufacturing issue.
